name: UNILAG
text:
If you have any question, drop it here‚Ä¶  Subsequent episodes on links to resources and in-depth discussion on each step would hold based on the feedback received on tonight‚Äôs conversation. 
#GradSchoolUS #Fall2020 #unilag

name: FunTimes¬†üçë¬†üçÜ¬†üçº
text: Unilag lecturers rn  #TachaXTeebillzpic.twitter.com/9nbLNh3jMj

name: UNILAG
text:
With your visa, you‚Äôre off and good to go‚Ä¶.

Above all, TRUST GOD and stay informed!

#GradSchoolUS #Fall2020 #Unilag | #TachaXTeebillz #PowerOfCoolSongChallenge #AccessTheStars #WatchGeminiMan Kimani Ololo New Media

name: UNILAG
text:
Once funding has been received, then it‚Äôs VISA interview‚Ä¶ here the catch is that the funding opportunity portrays you to be a genuine student to the consular‚Ä¶ so it bolsters your chances‚Ä¶ Once in a while village people might step in you know.

#GradSchoolUS #Fall2020 #Unilag

name: Angel Amayo
text: 2019 Metro National Spelling Bee Champs, from left: Stephanie Asa'h(Unilag): N1,000,000; Mubarak Bakare (OAU):N200,000; Confidence Oguzi (UNN): N300,000. Congrats to them! pic.twitter.com/GymIn956VD

name: UNILAG
text:
Some schools admission offer automatically comes with funding while others making funding decisions separately‚Ä¶ Whichever way, your communication with Grad cords before application would have hinted you on your funding odds before application.

#GradSchoolUS #Fall2020 #unilag

name: UNILAG
text: The Documents needed are: Transcripts (I advise student to evaluate using WES even though it‚Äôs quite expensive‚Ä¶about 120k), Test scores, Resume, Statement of purpose, 2-3 Recommendation letters, application fees (few are free and it can be waived if you attend online webinars)!

name: UNILAG
text:
Ensure you apply to schools that meet your profile. GRE+TOEFL quartile, CGPA, Resume etc. Responses based on your communication with Grad cords and faculties also matter‚Ä¶

#GradSchoolUS #Fall2020 #Unilag | #TachaXTeebillz #PowerOfCoolSongChallenge #AccessTheStars #WatchGeminiMan

name: Adegboye Oyindamola
text: Unilag #Elevatorbaby

name: UNILAG
text:
Also contact faculties (lecturers) to signify your interest in the school‚Äôs programme. There are templates available on request‚Ä¶

#GradSchoolUS #Fall2020 #Unilag | #TachaXTeebillz #PowerOfCoolSongChallenge #AccessTheStars  #WatchGeminiMan Kimani Ololo New Media

name: UNILAG
text:
One advice, once you shortlist schools, send emails to the grad cord of the schools and ask specific questions relating to that course and funding opportunities, be very explicit.

#GradSchoolUS #Fall2020 #Unilag | #AccessTheStars #WatchGeminiMan Kimani Ololo New Media

name: UNILAG
text:
Schools differ in their process, for some once you get an assistantship, your tuition will be waived and you will also be paid a monthly stipend that can take care of your living expenses

#GradSchoolUS #Fall2020 #Unilag | #TachaXTeebillz #PowerOfCoolSongChallenge #AccessTheStars

name: Dr Psychs | 23rd savage¬†üó£¬†üí¶
text: #Elecatorbaby Unilag

name: UNILAG
text:
This assistantship can either be Research Assistant, Teaching Assistant or Administrative Assistant.

#GradSchoolUS #Fall2020 #Unilag | #TachaXTeebillz #PowerOfCoolSongChallenge #AccessTheStars #WatchGeminiMan Kimani Ololo New Media

name: UNILAG
text:
So for the funding opportunity, if you have good results (GRE, GPA, Toefl), SOP and LOR; US schools do offer assistanTship to graduate students. 

#GradSchoolUS #Fall2020 #Unilag | #TachaXTeebillz #PowerOfCoolSongChallenge #AccessTheStars #WatchGeminiMan Kimani Ololo New Media

name: UNILAG
text:
TOEFL is an English test required by some US universities. though, some schools waive due to the fact that Nigeria is an Anglophone country. 
#GradSchoolUS #Fall2020 #Unilag | #TachaXTeebillz #PowerOfCoolSongChallenge #AccessTheStars #WatchGeminiMan Kimani Ololo New Media

name: Oluwa Tobi
text: I am a Business student but Unilag is teaching me Engineering Mathematics

name: Taye Paul Olubayo, MFR
text: Lmaooooooooo

name: UNILAG
text:
Register & take the exams. You can register for GRE as soon as you are ready &prepared to take the exam. Its done online at http://www.ets.org¬†. You can also get all the information you need about the exam on the website. 
#GradSchoolUS #Fall2020 #Unilag - #TachaXTeebillz

name: UNILAG
text:
Endeavour to check up the website of the schools you find, to see the requirements. Most schools will require GRE and some will also require TOEFL!
#GradSchoolUS #Fall2020 #Unilag -#TachaXTeebillz #PowerOfCoolSongChallenge #AccessTheStars #WatchGeminiMan Kimani Ololo New Media

name: UNILAG
text: OR you could simply search using a)http://www.msinus.com¬† (you should see a list of school and ranking for some of the most common courses) b)http://www.gradschools.com¬† c)http://www.google.com¬† type 'msc in bla bla in the us in google' d) http://www.usnews.com¬† #4icu.org

name: UNILAG
text: Use online resources to search for school (Nairaland, USnews, gradcafe, EducationUSA). The #EducationUSA route is fantastic for first class graduates as they offer OFP(selected scholars) scholarships throughout the admission process i.e they pay for the entire application process

name: UNILAG
text: The CGPA equivalent should be 3/4 using the WES FREE GPA calculator (https://applications.wes.org/igpa-calculator/¬†‚Ä¶), so a GPA of 3.2/5 for a four year programme from any Nigerian University might qualify... #GradSchoolUS #Fall2020 #Unilag  | #TachaXTeebillz #WatchGeminiMan Kimani Ololo New Media

name: Taye Paul Olubayo, MFR
text: These Vector influencers are on overdrive tonight

name: UNILAG
text: Decide on the course you want to study and have the required CGPA from any recognized institution of learning i.e be a degree holder (HND/BSc), in fact I have seen NOUN students get funded #GradSchoolUS #Fall2020 #unilag -#TachaXTeebillz #PowerOfCoolSongChallenge #AccessTheStars

text:

So what is this admission process like?
#GradSchoolUS #Fall2020 #Unilag

name: LF

name: LF
text: We also amplified the same important messages on opportunities for the Girl Child and rights of women on UNILAG FM.  Many thanks to Beatrice Okeyugbo (the lady standing next to me), my‚Ä¶ https://www.instagram.com/p/B3fTFClnk6Kfvt84WZWR0uZYWIeEYizVbXKDLI0/?igshid=hhc28lvhup8a¬†‚Ä¶

name: UNILAG
text: Disclaimer: The journey is honestly not an easy one, most especially the GRE, then the admission decision waiting time, VISA processing etc.. So you‚Äôve to be ready to give it your all! #GradSchoolUS #Fall2020 #Unilag

name: UNILAG
text:
So there are 2 major admission sessions in the US ‚Äì Fall (August) and Spring (January).
Sometimes you can find in Summer(May)‚Ä¶.
Notwithstanding, he FALL is the most funded admission session‚Ä¶. #GradSchoolUS #Fall2020 #Unilag

name: UNILAG
text: Truth is, I know more than 20 Nigerians who benefited from this in #Fall18. The number more than doubled last fall..#Fall19‚Ä¶ So whatever would be shared here has been tested and it is trusted. #GradSchoolUS #Fall2020 #Unilag

name: UNILAG
text: The field of STEM is Science, Technology, Engineering & Mathematics. Well, other majors also get funded but not as much as STEM majors. #GradSchoolUS #Fall2020 #Unilag UNILAG

name: UNILAG
text:
Welcome to everyone‚Ä¶. 

We would be discussing about securing funded admission for graduate studies (STEM MAJORS) in the US this evening. #GradSchoolUS #Fall2020 #Unilag UNILAG #USA

name: UNILAG
text:
The discussion is LIVE! #GradSchoolUS #Fall2020 

Mention a friend to join in.... This could change a life on your timeline #Unilag

name: UNILAG FM 103.1
Ibrahim Salawu
text: A strong belief in God gives you a sense of safety & assurance that in times you can't control your circumstances, there is a higher power that's "got your back." That way you don't have to carry the weight of the world on your head. Just believe & relax. #WorldMentalHealthDay

name: Ibrahim Salawu
text: 5) Faith: Regardless of your position in life or religion, we can all agree our anxiety stems from a place of fear. Fear of the unknown, fear of failure, fear due to lack of control in an increasingly chaotic world. It sure does not hurt to have something or someone to believe in

name: Ibrahim Salawu
text: Apps like OAK and others offer a free and easy introduction to mindfulness and meditation through their 'guided meditation' and breathing exercises. #WorldMentalHealthDay

name: Ibrahim Salawu
text: 4) Meditate: Meditation is one thing a lot of people shy away from because they consider it weird, spiritual or outright difficult. TBH, meditation can be those things at first, but with daily practice you begin to notice the positive effect on your mental health. Just breathe.

name: Ibrahim Salawu
text: Adequate sleep (6-8hrs), helps you gain mental clarity, reduces brain fog and mental fatigue, so you can live to your full potential. Your mood s amazing leaving you happier and more productive; plus you live at optimum health. #WorldMentalHealthDay

name: Ibrahim Salawu
text: 3) SLEEP: A lot of the youths today have this grind mentality that makes them think sleeping is reserved for lazy people. 'I'll sleep when I'm rich' 'Money doesn't sleep' 'If you sleep life will pass you by,' quotes like these have spent way too many people to an early grave.

name: Ibrahim Salawu
text: 2b) Most people don't use Calendars and To-do lists the best way possible. got some bills you need to pay? Use a to-do list so you know which you've paid and pending bills, same goes for meetings and events; always input them in your calendar so you can your life without stress.

name: Ibrahim Salawu
text: Alarms and Reminders, as simple as they are, help you relax not feeling there's something you have to do that you're forgetting. #WorldMentalHealthDay

name: Ibrahim Salawu
text: 2) Take advantage of technology at your disposal: Unburden your mind as much as possible by using your phone's alarm and reminder features. Need to take your clothes in by 6pm? Just set an alarm. Need to call your mum about the aso ebi next week? Set a reminder.

name: Ibrahim Salawu
text:
Today is #WorldMentalHealthDay!

Here are a couple of ways you can prioritise your #MentalHealth and live a better life:

1) Stay Organised: Life gets easier when you live a structured life; have a daily schedule, morning and evening routine, and a meal plan for starters.

Sex For Grades: Boniface Igbeneghu Suspended By UNILAG.
